## Decide.then() method

监听决议，当被决议后，会自动回调 cb，并回传最新的 this.value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
then(cb: (val: V) => void): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | (val: V) =&gt; void |  |
